sources_consulted: Web search: Bain consulting interview process 2025 undergraduate recruiting timeline

tagline.source: synthesized from MC profile and firm description

offices.note: Extracted 11 US/Canada office cities from MC profile

regions.note: MC shows offices in Asia/Oceania, Europe, LATAM, Middle East/Africa, North America

specialties.note: Selected top 6 from MC list: Strategy, Private Equity, M&A, Operations, Technology & Digital (as Digital), Customer Experience

industries.note: Synthesized from firm description mentioning consumer goods, tech, healthcare, financial services

known_for.note: MC mentions: Founded by Bill Bain from BCG in 1973, Results Delivery® methodology, 75%+ PE firms served

career_path.note: Listed progression: Associate Consultant → Senior Associate Consultant → Consultant → Case Team Leader → Manager → Principal → Partner

travel.note: MBB firms typically have high travel (M-Th at client site)

work_hours.note: MBB firms are known for intense work hours (60+ hrs/week)

recruiting.process.note: Application → Testing → Phone/Video Screen → First Round (2x 40min case) → Final Round (2x 40min case)

recruiting.unique.note: Aptitude + psychometric testing, candidate-led cases, 1-2% acceptance rate, 4-6 week process

recruiting.timeline.note: Applications July-November depending on school, submit 4-5 days early recommended

email_format.note: Listed as 'firstname.lastname@bain.com' in Firm Details section

links.byu_current.note: People search with currentCompany filter and BYU school ID 4035

links.byu_past.note: People search with pastCompany filter and BYU school ID 4035

links.marriott_current.note: People search with currentCompany filter and Marriott school ID 15095601

links.marriott_past.note: People search with pastCompany filter and Marriott school ID 15095601

byu.pipeline.note: 54 current alumni indicates active recruiting presence

byu.tip.source: synthesized from alumni data and geography
byu.tip.note: Recommendation based on strong BYU presence and West Coast office locations

notes: Bain & Company is one of the 'MBB' firms (McKinsey, BCG, Bain) - the most prestigious tier in management consulting. Research was comprehensive with excellent data from Management Consulted including detailed compensation breakdowns, office lists, email format, and recruiting information. LinkedIn ID 2114 and BYU alumni data pre-populated from CSV. MC profile shows 65 global offices across 40 countries. Strong BYU representation with 54 current and 323 all-time alumni. Founded 1973 by Bill Bain from BCG partners. Known for Results Delivery® methodology and PE dominance (75%+ of PE firms). Research duration: 4 minutes 4 seconds.
